metadata.synopsis: Dialog with a child in Cazador's Dungeon.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Fallback dialog (player shouldn't be able to trigger it naturally).Use oe startDialog to test.

0.speaker: Misha
0.text: This place is full of monsters like you. But my family will come - they'll save us.

1.speaker: Misha
1.text: They'll be here soon. They'll come for us.
